name: DarkWorld
description:
Explore a Dark World where you posses the only light source. Navigate your way through various object some of which are only visible in your light.


Controls:

  • A/D for left and right.
  • Space to Jump.
  • Left Shift to focus your light. 

Bugs:

  • Focus Meter won't work.

Made in under 3 days for DevAtlas GameJam.
